title: Bolton asked to testify next week in impeachment inquiry: reports
text: John Bolton, President Donald Trump's former national security adviser, has been asked to testify before lawmakers next week in their impeachment inquiry, the New York Times and other outlets reported Wednesday. However, it's unclear if he will appear, since the administration could say he's immune from giving testimony. Democrats are probing whether Trump withheld aid to Ukraine to pressure that country's president to launch an investigation of former Vice President Joe Biden and his son Hunter.
